General.Name: Pasdec Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Pasdec Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the development of residential and commercial properties in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development, Construction, and Others segments. It also constructs residential and commercial properties; and offers property management and maintenance, project management, and building and civil construction services. In addition, the company is involved in renewable energy business. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Kuantan, Malaysia.
